Package database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Database
  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    One static instance of Database is created. Class implements working on set of Chapter objects. Each chapter can store Question objects.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Database database

      Creates or imports Database

    • Field Detail

      • database

        public static Database database

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database​(java.nio.file.Path initDirectory,
                Mode mode)
        Creates or imports Database
        Parameters:
        initDirectory - Path to directory, where Database folder is stored (READ mode), or will be created (CREATE mode).
        mode - if object is set to OPEN mode - imports Databse from initDirectory if object is set to CREATE mode - creates Database directory with Path: initDirectory/databaseDir

    • Method Detail

      • addNewQuestion

        public java.nio.file.Path addNewQuestion​(java.nio.file.Path chapterPath,
                                         java.lang.String questionText,
                                         java.lang.String answerText)
        Adds new question to chapter from path: chapterPath.
        Parameters:
        chapterPath - path to chapter, where question should be added.
        questionText - Text of new question.
        answerText - Text of answer on new question.
        Returns:
        Return path of new question.

      • addNewChapter

        public java.nio.file.Path addNewChapter​(java.lang.String chapterName)
        Adds new Chapter to database. If Chapter with chapterName exists, returns null and not creating chapter. If adding new chapter was succesfull, returns Path to added chapter.
        Parameters:
        chapterName - name of new Chapter
        Returns:
        returns Path to new added chapter or null - if adding was not succesfull

      • nextQuestion

        public database.chapter.question.Question nextQuestion()
        returns next Question from Database, that is active and wasn't answered. Works in cycle. If every active question was returned, returns first active question (from beginning).
        Returns:
        Returns active, not answered question.

      • getActualChapterName

        public java.lang.String getActualChapterName()
        Returns:
        name of chapter from which last question was returned.
